context_bundle.summary: Task dispatch protocol for DC-KALIC agent mesh. Structured JSON schema for inter-agent task requests and responses. Types: SCAN, AUDIT, BUILD, QUERY, REPORT.

onboarding.quick_start: Task format: {id, type, target, params:{tool,flags,scope,output_format}, priority, callback}. Response: {id, status, result:{summary,findings,artifacts}, error, duration_ms}. Callback via AHK direct injection.
common_patterns: Callback: AHK for immediate, FILE for batch, NONE for fire-and-forget
